about_the_game:
This DLC comes with:
  • an Artbook including works from the concept artists, character designs, early 3D prototypes from the game’s development, and more.
  • the Original Soundtrack for Before Your Eyes by Oliver Lewin and Dillon Terry as both MP3 and lossless WAV files. Mixed and mastered by Justice Harrison, Dillon Terry, and Oliver Lewin. Performed by Oliver Lewin, Dillon Terry, and Trevor Estes.
detailed_description:
This DLC comes with:
  • an Artbook including works from the concept artists, character designs, early 3D prototypes from the game’s development, and more.
  • the Original Soundtrack for Before Your Eyes by Oliver Lewin and Dillon Terry as both MP3 and lossless WAV files. Mixed and mastered by Justice Harrison, Dillon Terry, and Oliver Lewin. Performed by Oliver Lewin, Dillon Terry, and Trevor Estes.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 and up
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Plus or Radeon Pro 450
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS 10.13 and up
  • Processor: M1 or Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 integrated graphics
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit and above
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 880K 4Ghz or Intel Pentium G4500 3.5Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520 or AMD Radeon Vega Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1500X 3.5Ghz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480, NVIDIA GTX 970, 4 GB of Video Memory and above
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

short_description: This DLC comes with an Artbook including works from the concept artists, character designs, and early 3D prototypes from the game’s development, plus the Original Soundtrack for Before Your Eyes.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
